DepthSense::Context::ClientConnectedData Struct Reference

Holds the DepthSense::Context::ClientConnectedEvent arguments. More...

Public Attributes

std::string appName
 the name of the client executable, or an empty string if it could not be determined
 
int32_t pid
 the process ID of the client, or -1 if it could not be determined
 
std::string sourceIP
 the source IP address
 
int32_t sourcePort
 the source IP port
 

Detailed Description

The ClientConnectedData struct holds the DepthSense::Context::ClientConnectedEvent parameters and is passed to callbacks connected to that event.
